类 Connect

  • java.lang.Object
    • Connect
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class Connect
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    class: use for connecting.

    • 嵌套类概要

      嵌套类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明

      class: timer task.

      限定符和类型 字段和说明

      variable: use for reading buffer.

      constant: connecting time limit.

      variable: use for printing buffer.
      private boolean runFlag
      variable: a flag to check if the thread is running.
      private java.lang.Thread thread
      variable: create a thread.
      private java.util.Timer timer
      variable: use for record time.
